import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { projectsAPI, tasksAPI } from '../../services/api'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import { BarChart3, CheckCircle, Clock, Users, TrendingUp, Calendar, Target, Zap, Award, Activity, PieChart, ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Minus, Star, Timer, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const ProjectAnalytics = ({ projectId, projectName }) => { // Fetch project-specific analytics const { data: analyticsResp, isLoading, error } = useQuery( ['project-analytics', projectId], async () => { try { // Try project-specific analytics first const res = await projectsAPI.getProjectAnalytics(projectId); return res.data || res; } catch (error) { console.error('Project-specific analytics failed, falling back to general analytics:', error); // Fallback to general task analytics if project-specific fails const res = await tasksAPI.getTaskAnalytics(); return res.data || res; } }, { enabled: !!projectId, refetchInterval: 30000, // Refresh every 30 seconds } ); const analytics = analyticsResp?.data || analyticsResp; if (isLoading) { return (
); } if (!analytics) { return (

No analytics data available

); } // Handle both project-specific analytics and general analytics const isProjectSpecific = analytics && analytics.project; const displayProjectName = isProjectSpecific ? analytics.project.name : projectName; const stats = [ { title: 'Total Tasks', value: analytics.total_tasks || 0, icon: BarChart3, color: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-100 to-blue-200', borderColor: 'border-blue-200', trend: '+12%', trendUp: true, }, { title: 'Completed Tasks', value: analytics.completed_tasks || 0, icon: CheckCircle, color: 'text-green-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-green-100 to-green-200', borderColor: 'border-green-200', trend: '+8%', trendUp: true, }, { title: 'In Progress', value: analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, icon: Clock, color: 'text-yellow-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-100 to-yellow-200', borderColor: 'border-yellow-200', trend: '-3%', trendUp: false, }, { title: 'Team Members', value: analytics.team_members || 0, icon: Users, color: 'text-purple-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-100 to-purple-200', borderColor: 'border-purple-200', trend: '+2', trendUp: true, }, ]; const additionalStats = [ { title: 'Avg. Task Duration', value: analytics.avg_task_duration ? `${analytics.avg_task_duration} days` : 'N/A', icon: Timer, color: 'text-indigo-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-100 to-indigo-200', }, { title: 'Productivity Score', value: `${Math.min(100, Math.round((completionRate + (analytics.team_members || 0) * 5) / 2))}%`, icon: Zap, color: 'text-orange-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-100 to-orange-200', }, { title: 'Quality Rating', value: analytics.quality_rating ? `${analytics.quality_rating}/5` : '4.2/5', icon: Star, color: 'text-pink-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-pink-100 to-pink-200', }, { title: 'Risk Level', value: completionRate < 30 ? 'High' : completionRate < 70 ? 'Medium' : 'Low', icon: AlertCircle, color: completionRate < 30 ? 'text-red-600' : completionRate < 70 ? 'text-yellow-600' : 'text-green-600', bgColor: completionRate < 30 ? 'bg-gradient-to-br from-red-100 to-red-200' : completionRate < 70 ? 'bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-100 to-yellow-200' : 'bg-gradient-to-br from-green-100 to-green-200', }, ]; const completionRate = analytics.total_tasks > 0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0; return (
{/* Enhanced Header */}

Project Analytics

{displayProjectName && (

{displayProjectName}

)}

Comprehensive insights and performance metrics

Live • Updated {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}
{/* Primary Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.trendUp ? ( ) : ( )} {stat.trend}

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

 ))}
{/* Secondary Stats Grid */}
{additionalStats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

 ))}
{/* Enhanced Progress Overview */}

Project Progress

Overall completion status

{completionRate}%

Completion Rate

Completed
{analytics.completed_tasks || 0}
In Progress
{analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0}
To Do
{(analytics.total_tasks || 0) - (analytics.completed_tasks || 0) - (analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0)}
{/* Performance Metrics */}

Performance Metrics

Key performance indicators

Velocity

Tasks per week

{Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks || 0) / Math.max(1, analytics.avg_task_duration || 1))}

Efficiency

Completion ratio

{Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks || 0) / Math.max(1, analytics.total_tasks || 1) * 100)}%

Team Utilization

Active members

{Math.round((analytics.team_members || 0) * 0.85)}/{analytics.team_members || 0}
{/* Task History */} {analytics.recent_completed_tasks && analytics.recent_completed_tasks.length > 0 && (

Recently Completed Tasks

{analytics.recent_completed_tasks.slice(0, 5).map((task, index) => (

{task.title}

Completed by {task.completed_by} • {new Date(task.completed_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{task.priority && ( {task.priority} )}
))}
)} {/* Team Performance */} {analytics.team_performance && analytics.team_performance.length > 0 && (

Team Performance

{analytics.team_performance.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.email}

{member.completed_tasks || 0}

tasks completed

))}
)} {/* Project Timeline */}

Project Timeline

Project Started {analytics.project_start_date ? new Date(analytics.project_start_date).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
Last Activity {analytics.last_activity ? new Date(analytics.last_activity).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
Average Task Duration {analytics.avg_task_duration ? `${analytics.avg_task_duration} days` : 'N/A'}
); }; export default ProjectAnalytics;
